me.mcblueparrot.spade.api.world.area

Interface Area

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable<Area>, java.lang.Iterable<Block>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CuboidArea

    public interface Area
extends java.lang.Iterable<Block>, Cloneable<Area>
    Represents an area in a world.
